Actions.Name: That One!
Actions.Description: A foe in range 5 is marked.
Actions.Mark: While marked, they count as holding a valuables token.

Actions.Name: Uppercut
Actions.Description: An adjacent character is dazed. If that character has a valuables token, they also take [fray] damage.

Actions.Name: Haymaker
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe must save or take [D]+[fray] and become stunned and winded, or just winded on a successful save.

Actions.Name: No Nonsense
Actions.Description: Can only be used while bloodied. The Scrapper gains vigor 1, then becomes unstoppable and gains counter while in this stance.
